Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller is used to control the player movement and shooting. It also handles the 'gravity' for every GameObject.
    Version:
    v1.0_Alpha
    Author:
    Richard Healey
